docs.snippet: A Syrian migrant who arrived in Germany two years ago has been arrested on suspicion of seeking funds from Islamic State to drive truck bombs into a crowd, a German state prosecutor's office said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Syrian migrant who arrived in Germany two years ago has been arrested on suspicion of seeking funds from Islamic State to drive truck bombs into a crowd, a German state prosecutor's office said on Monday.

headline.main: Syrian Suspected of Planning Truck Attack in Germany Arrested: Prosecutors

docs.snippet: Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp was lost for words to explain their late collapse in a 2-2 draw at Sunderland in the Premier League on Monday after the hosts twice came from behind to snatch a draw thanks to a pair of Jermain Defoe penalties....

docs.snippet: Substitute Enner Valencia scored his first Everton goal to break Southampton's resolve and send the home side on their way to a 3-0 win at Goodison Park on Monday, with Leighton Baines and Romelu Lukaku also finding the net....
docs.lead_paragraph: Substitute Enner Valencia scored his first Everton goal to break Southampton's resolve and send the home side on their way to a 3-0 win at Goodison Park on Monday, with Leighton Baines and Romelu Lukaku also finding the net.

headline.main: Valencia Ends Goal Drought as Everton Down Southampton
